%title /ab/experiments/{experimentId}/alternatives/{alternativeId} PUT 更新一个Alternative

=/ab/experiments/{experimentId}/alternatives/{alternativeId} PUT=

==功能 ==
更新一个候选方案 `Alternative`

==URL==
/ab/experiments/{experimentId}/alternatives/{alternativeId}

==HTTP请求方式==
PUT

==请求类型==
JSON XML 

==请求参数==
* 路径参数
| 参数名        | 值     | 描述                                       |
|---------------|--------|--------------------------------------------|
| experimentId  | String | 要更新的 `Alternative` 所属的 `Experiment` |
| alternativeId | String | 要更新的 `Alternative`                     |

* XML 类型
{{{ class="brush:xml"
            <alternative>
                <code>A_A</code>
                <name>Alternative a</name>
                <description>test alternative a</description>
                <isActive>true</isActive>
                <ruleParams>
                    <param1>30</param1>
                </ruleParams>
            </alternative>
  }}}
  
* JSON 类型
{{{ class="brush:js"
            {
                "code": "A_A",
                "name": "Alternative a",
                "description": "test alternative description a",
                "isActive": true,
                "ruleParams": {
                    "param1": "30",
                    "param2": null,
                    "param3": null,
                    "param4": null,
                    "param5": null,
                    "param6": null,
                    "param7": null,
                    "param8": null,
                    "param9": null
                }
            }
}
  }}}

==返回结果==
| 状态 | 结果     |
|------|----------|
| 200  | 更新成功 |

==测试==
{{{ class="brush:bash"
curl -v -X put -HContent-type:application/xml --data "<xml data>" https://baseurl/experiments/{experimentId}/alternatives/{alternativeId}
curl -v -X put -HContent-type:application/json --data "<json data>" https://baseurl/experiments/{experimentId}/alternatives/{alternativeId}
  }}}
